document.masterDocTitle: Stegocephalidae (Crustacea: Amphipoda) from Australia and New Zealand, With Descriptions of Eight New Species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Stegocephalidae (Crustacea: Amphipoda) from Australia and New Zealand, With Descriptions of Eight New Species

subSubSection.paragraph:
Remarks . These are the first records of the genus
Stegocephaloides
in the area.
